LanguageData.cum_on_body_desc: Enables cum hediffs in health tab.
LanguageData.cum_on_body_amount_desc: All cum applied to pawn bodies will be multiplied by this amount.
LanguageData.cum_overlays_desc: Enables cum overlay for pawn drawer(may have conflicts with mods that change pawn appearance and other issues).\nRequires Cum on body option enabled.
LanguageData.manual_hero_CleanSelf_desc: Hero pawn will only clean cum from body if manually told so.
LanguageData.dubsDBH_block_CleanSelf_desc: If DubsBadHygiene installed, pawns will only clean cum from body in buckets, showers, baths, hottubs etc.
